payload.content: Igor's initial impressions of OpenClaw were that it was an expensive, complicated AI system filled with security risks, and it didn't have enough impressive real-world use cases to make it worthwhile.

name: Igor's initial impressions of OpenClaw were that it was an expensive, complicate
content: Igor's initial impressions of OpenClaw were that it was an expensive, complicated AI system filled with security risks, and it didn't have enough impressive real-world use cases to make it worthwhile.

payload.content: After extensive testing, Igor now reports that OpenClaw, despite being expensive, complicated, and a security nightmare, offers enough real-world use cases to justify its cost and effort for certain users.

name: After extensive testing, Igor now reports that OpenClaw, despite being expensive
